comments.commentBody:
Russia. Lying and evasive staff. A cruel pending wallop on America's already second rate Health coverage system. No incriminating tax returns.

Whatever.

These are all indications of a presidency that is screaming to be stopped and the damage reversed.

However what upsets me even more is the impending attacks on basic civil rights, the environment, the giveaways to the already rich and the fall of grace and dignity that our highest office of our country promises.

The fact that great strides in progress will be undone by this man, these mediocre players in the Republican Congress and their thoughtless followers is like taking the original print of Guernica and having Ivanka Trump hawk it on a late night channel and then spending the money on more tacky jewelry.

NO more than the Republicans of the last eight years. Tit for Tat I say. Obstruct, flummox, castigate, scream, accuse. Some of it will finally stick and the facts be damned. This is a perfect exercise of the lessons of the past eight years, and you know what, it worked. My only fear is the Democrats have this streak of humanity and reason that will probably hamstring their efforts.
The President of the United States is looking more and more like a Russian espionage agent.

Humpty Trumpty imagined his wall, Humpty Trumpty had a great fall.
All the Kremlin's agents and all the duplicitous men couldn't put Trumpty back together again..
I would like to hear why the Trump campaign team was having so much interaction with Russia in the first place.  I'm sure they weren't looking for a salad dressing recipe.

What do you expect to see in Trump's tax returns, bribes from Putin declared as income?  99% of the people screaming for Trump's tax returns don't understand their own tax returns. It's nothing but grist for the resistance mill.
Will see, body.
My father's family escaped eastern Europe.  I don't know about the rest of you, but I have no desire to live like your average Russian because Donald and a select few wish to live like Putin.

Again, here MSM/NYT goes on the rampage with a high degree of hypocrisy. Where is the coverage of all of the Dems who met with the Russians, ergo doing their jobs? Why is there already 7x more coverage this past week than when AGHolder was brought up on contempt charges? No one here in the NYT has a headline saying "Pelosi and McCaskill caught up in their own lies as evidence clearly shows them meeting with same Russian Ambassador....the one they blast AGSessions for meeting with"
Have you no morals?
Were Pelosi and McCaskill under oath in front of a congressional Committee considering their confirmation to become Chief Law Enforcement Officer?
Unfortunately thanks to Gerrymandering this tactic won't work anymore.

The pattern of people lying when they ostensibly shouldn't have to suggests to me an "insiders " vs. "outsiders" situation in the White House, with the Pence example being the most glaring.

Who did Flynn lie to? The only guy with a modicum of integrity, or at least deep ties to establishment Washington. Why? Because Donald told him to keep chump-Pence in the dark about all that Russia stuff.

As to Sessions - not sure where he falls in the world of integrity, but I don't need to wonder about his allegiances; Donald Trump just gave him the job he's wanted his whole life. He also has that obvious tell when he lies - the smirking. It's unmistakable.
Where is the substance in this article? Mere meetings with Russians, which members of both parties have all the time, proves nothing.

Really if it was nothing why was it done in secret? The one coming up about the Dems currently have all been done with knowledge and in public and with the press. The other is not and the lied about it until confronted.

The substance is in the fact that Trump insists none of his people had any contact with Russians. If this was all so routine why lie about it? You don't want to see that because of what it means about Trump.
I do not believe a lot of these politicians in Washington care a hoot about how history will judge them.  Or God.

Trump accused Obama of being a Manchurian candidate -- a sleeper spy planted by the Russians.

Now Russia and Trump both say that people opposing Trump have created a "witch-hunt" for people with concealed connections to Russia.

This gets freakier every day.

"....Rabbi Berel Lazar, the chief rabbi of Russia and an ally of Russia’s president, Vladimir V. Putin."
Chief Rabbi of Russia? Is that an actual title? I'd like to know how one becomes the "chief rabbi" of anywhere. The Jewish religion is not like the Catholic Church. No one elects or appoints a Chief Rabbi from within the religion. So of course he's an ally of Putin. Putin appointed him.
I wonder how many republicans knew that they were voting for the Russian candidate for the President of the United States of America? I wonder when Trump is going to hand over the reins to Putin?

My first response to this comment was Wow!  Really?   But after I thought about it, I realized that at least in my case it's true.  The woman I was with brought out qualities in me I never even knew I had.  I'm sure too that the way Jason looks in Amy's eyes is a reflection of her love for him.

Any person in true love would need TIME to mourn a person.  Although every person is a bit different it would (for most people) certainly be more than a few months.  Why is there such an emphasis on "pairing up?" Let people enjoy the times they have alone.  Usually everyone eventually meets someone they marry of spend their lives with.  Get married for the right reason not the wrong ones such as "codependence."

Every person has his or her own path. Don't judge the extent of someone's love for another by the length of time that person appears to grieve the loss. Believe me, that sense of loss never leaves you, no matter what your next chapter holds.
The deniers of civil liberty only come out when it is not their side screaming and shutting down town halls. Hypocrisy is spelled with a P for Politics.

Wait a minute, you forgot one more "logical" step. Why not leave the money with the tax payers? Does Scott Walker believe they can spend their own money in ways infinitely better than the way State Capitals can?
Methinks it won't play out everywhere as it did in Wisconsin.

It's laughable that you think Republicans in Congress could come up with a replacement for the ACA over the next ten months, given the fact that they haven't managed to do that over the last seven years.

Repeal first and start the clock. Forget replacement, work instead on smoothing the bumps for the most needy during the transition period.

The bar for repeal is absolute and immediate, for replacement, _pretty_ low. From no replacement, to something slightly less imperfect than perfectly imperfect Obamacare. All with no timeline.

We didn't have this stuff pre-2010, it's been a proven FAIL, and it has nowhere to go but under. Get started already, what are you guys waiting for? Sure, no attaboys, no hugs, and the occasional protest. Big deal.

Calm down. It's an opinion piece written by the opposing side. Its the NYT job to publish something other than the echo chamber you yell into everyday.

Also, financial success is not the definitive measure of citizenship. There's a lot of people unhappy with the way Democrats have run the goverbment, get off your liberal high horse and realize that poor Americans who receive more federal subsidies than they pay in taxes get a vote too. Maybe if dems actually tried talking to these people we wouldn't have Trump in office. I say this as someone who supported 80 percent of what Obama did, I thought he was a class act. Too bad you guys are all busy playing identity politics to bring Americans from all states together. Since I know I'm going to get attacked as someone who supports racism, misogyny, etc... let me just say that I am an asian immigrant- legal mind you. I actually spent the time and resources to obey the law. Dems are losing a lot of Asian voters, I don't care what the polls say, most of my Asian friends around 30 years of age voted Trump. Precisely because of the arrogance liberals display every day in condemning anyone who doesn't agree with them to a T. Also because even a newspaper as left leaning as NYT gets attacked fir publishing an opinion piece from the opposing side. Seriously, if you want to win elections, learn how to talk to the other side.

Where do you want your dollar going? To your local school? Or to "build a wall?"
Caring for the needy in your community? Or to the Department of Defense?
Wisconsin is a taker state. They receive more funds from the Federal government than they pay in taxes.
